object_attributes.description:
Daily ETL process to extract customer data from PostgreSQL orders database and load full copy to datalake for analytics purposes
| Parameter | Value |
|:-----------------------| --------------------------------------------------:|
| source_database | postgresql://devuser:devpassword@10.0.0.7:5432/orders |
| database_available | true |
| source_table | customers |
| source_table_ddl | CREATE TABLE public.customers (
	customer_id UUID DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4() NOT NULL, 
	company_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	contact_name VARCHAR(100), 
	email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	phone VARCHAR(20), 
	address TEXT, 
	city VARCHAR(50), 
	country VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'USA'::character varying, 
	created_by UUID, 
	created_at TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
	CONSTRAINT customers_pkey PRIMARY KEY (customer_id), 
	CONSTRAINT customers_created_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY(created_by) REFERENCES public.users (user_id)
)
COMMENT ON TABLE customers IS 'External customers who place orders';
COMMENT ON COLUMN customers.customer_id IS 'Unique identifier for customer';
COMMENT ON COLUMN customers.company_name IS 'Name of the customer company';
COMMENT ON COLUMN customers.contact_name IS 'Primary contact person';
COMMENT ON COLUMN customers.email IS 'Customer contact email';
COMMENT ON COLUMN customers.phone IS 'Contact phone number';
COMMENT ON COLUMN customers.address IS 'Street address';
COMMENT ON COLUMN customers.city IS 'City of residence';
COMMENT ON COLUMN customers.country IS 'Country (default: USA)';
COMMENT ON COLUMN customers.created_by IS 'User who registered this customer';
COMMENT ON COLUMN customers.created_at IS 'When customer was created'; |
| interval | 0 0 * * * |
| required_transformations | No transformations needed |
| target_table | raw_orders.customers |
| target_storing_type | full |
| capture_changes_column | created_at |
| data_quality | Default checks (count, null counts) plus duplicate checking |
object_attributes.title: ETL from orders.customers to datalake
